user.title: Video Normalizer - Welcome
user.description:
**Recommendation:** To get the most out of this integration, it is recommended to have the **Downloader** integration installed ({has_downloader} Installed).

Downloader allows automatic file downloads, which complements perfectly with Video Normalizer to process downloaded videos.

You can install Downloader from: {downloader_url}

Press **Submit** to continue with the configuration.

configure.title: Configuration - Video Normalizer
configure.description:
Configure the download directory where videos to be processed are located.

The directory has been automatically detected from your Downloader integration configuration.

error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

abort.downloader_required: The Downloader integration is required but not installed. Please install it first from: {downloader_url}
